column1: Little Goat Diner////While I'd be the first to say the Girl and the Goat fully lives up to the hype
column2: I'm not as big a fan as this place. With that said
column3: this is a very well run place that puts out interesting takes on classic diner food. The ambiance is excellent
column7: and the food decent. With that said and the place is crazy packed
column8: as I ate their odd take on eggs benedict I wondered about all the other diners in Chicago which probably were empty and much more deserving of our patronage. I dunno - classic diner food is classic since well
column9: its classic. I'm not sure I need kimchi on my eggs benedict.
